item.description: Experience Jul 2020/Present - Software Enginner, Konker Backend development focusing on SAST (Static Application Security Testing) using Go with Postgres database. Development of CLI (Command line interface) Open Source of SAST. Marc 2019/Jul 2020 - Jr Software Enginner, Inmetrics Web development using Python with Django framework, integrating with Postgres and Elasticsearch databases with a focus on creating infrastructure and metrics projections. Out 2018/Mar 2019 - Analista de Desenvolvimento e Automação de Sistemas Junior, Inmetrics
